title: PROJECT CHESTS
body:
I just opened the ip project chest and now I'm left with 2 augment cache fragment and all the three blueprints I can not buy any more of the ip ones what do I do with the fragments






PS: is there any way I can get another fragment for the augment chest


PLEASE HELP

replies.body: rip me i bought 5 augment chests and didn't get a fragment.{{item:3070}}

If you've purchased all the Icon Caches and the Disruption Cache, the only other option to get another augment cache fragment is by chance through opening Augment Caches purchased with RP. 

For complete details on this event, check out our [FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ). Let me know if you have any questions.
I do have the same problem. I think the only way to get 3d fragment is to buy second time an icon using RP.

Augment Caches.  You gotta spend RL monies.

If you bought all three PROJECT icons and the Disruption icon, you should have enough cores to unlock the PROJECT blueprint from the Disruption chest, or (if that's your thing) one of the loading screen icons.

I don't i spent it on project yi and  I don't know how to get one more fragment for the augment boxes i already have two 
so IDK what to do with them
